setting: an alien jungle with glowing, pulsating flora
the interior of a dark, living machine
cave interior lit with eerie bioluminescent light
in the bio-luminescent twilight of an alien forest
in the green bio-luminescent black caves
in the black stone lair built into subterranean cavern
time_of_day: in the perpetual glow of a nebula
perspective_angle: low angle perspective looking up at the character
high angle perspective looking down at the character
low angle looking up at the character
high angle looking down at the character
armor: scaled skin that acts as natural armor
dark sleek, form-fitting suit of metallic alloy
minimalist armor plating over vital areas
weapon: energy projectiles firing from its eyes or hands
accessories: glowing light from seams and joints
eyes: barely visible eyes that blend into the face
pose: crouched low to the ground, ready to pounce
moving with an unsettling, fluid grace
boots: its lower body has the shape of a mythical creatures lower half
